mainText: Angular in depth has published an article on Angular container components. This article is focused on extracting a container component from a mixed one and helps you to better understand the differences.

Angular 7 is released, the upgrade is proved to be the most convenient upgrade ever. The RxJs version is upgraded to 6.3, and the TypeScript is now on version 3.1 . The bad news is that Ivy is not there yet, so you will have to wait a bit more. One of the most interesting additions to it is the Drag and Drop support. For more information refer to 'Angular.io' website.
